name: Universal Studios Theme Parks Adventure
overview: Universal Studios is a 3D adventure based on the world famous theme park. You play the role as a kid who freely travels around the park as he hits various rides such as Back to the Future, Jurassic Park, Jaws, Wild Wild Wild West Stunt Show, E.T. Adventure, Animated Celebration and Backdraft. The goal to the game is to earn stamps, which you receive when you have completed a rider, trivia answer or puzzle. Once you collect enough stamps you unlock new areas that you can explore.
